name: Extreme Beer Pong
description:
Prove you're the dude bro of all dude bros in this extreme test. The cups are not in the normal triangle and are at different heights on the table. There are 22 cups and only 27 balls to use so good luck.

Controls:

arrow keys to adjust your angles

left/right shift keys to toggle the ball on/off

left mouse button to shoot

and (in the unlikely event your ball gets stuck) space is to get another
